a.style: font-family:'Playfair Display', Georgia, 'Times New Roman', 'Liberation Serif', serif

text.tspan: Access to clean fuels for cooking vs. per capita energy use, 2021
Access to clean fuels or technologies reduce exposure to indoor air pollutants, a leading cause of death in

low-income households. Energy is measured in
kilowatt-hours
per person.

Per capita energy consumption
(kilowatt-hours per person)
Access to clean fuels for cooking
Data source: World Health Organization - Global Health Observatory (2025) and other sources
